author: China Uncensored

China isn’t preparing for war with America — it’s already fighting one. From sabotaging telecoms and power grids to flooding the U.S. with fentanyl, the CCP’s attacks are real and ongoing. Chris Chappell breaks down how the U.S. keeps ignoring the war it’s already in.

What Is A “Real” American? https://youtu.be/gbCNGjM-7Ac
